lines.text: Every family tree must have its sap.
My boy, when you get to the far distant city, write your mother, wash your neck, and don't go near the movies.
It's mighty easy for a boy to go wrong in a big city. He knew how to walk, but he didn't know where.

[Referring to An Actress dressed like Cleopatra]
There was Egypt in her dreamy eye, and mischief in the other.
How would you like to play my part in a moving picture?
No, sir, my folks wouldn't like it.
How would you like to play my husband in a picture?
In this scene you are making love to your wife -...
